price: 49. Dheh: Xaqu (Qur’aanka) waa yimid, Baadilkuna (Ibliis) waxna ma abuuri karo mana soo nooleyn karo20.
arabic: قُلۡ جَآءَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَمَا يُبۡدِئُ ٱلۡبَٰطِلُ وَمَا يُعِيدُ
footnotes: 20. Weedhan waxaa laga qaadanayaa inuu baadilku si dhan u awood beelayo, macnaha waa in la tirtirayo baadilka oo gebigaba meesha laga saarayo. Marka uu xaqu hirgalo, baadilka wuu hoobtaa.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul jāa al-ḥaqu wamā yub'di-u al-bāṭilu wamā yuʿīdu
